segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the sink is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling everywhere, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is just polishing her plate, ignoring the whole mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing or see her foot getting wet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, sneaking cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's dangerous; he could fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, holding her hand out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks peaceful, which makes this inside nonsense even more frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly by the sink, but the water's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at them to stop before something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is infuriating with all the risks they're taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman is getting soaked too, unknowingly.
segments.speaker: PAR
